content: Hey @Josh Mandel I've created a new branch in the github repository which will never be appropriate as the source of PRs for the master. But github is seeing it and prompting me to make a PR for it; is there any way to turn that off for a branch?

Hmm. I don't know if you can prevent GH from suggesting a PR -- and is there no way to dismiss the suggestion? I haven't hit this situation, but I think the prompt only appears within a smaller time window of your commits, so I believe it'll stop prompting you in a bit.
